title: r/Prorevenge Karen Tried To Get Me Fired, So I Got Her Fired First
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP works in a foreign country and has to submit an expense report. His company hires a local woman to translate his receipts for his expense reports, and this lady turns out to be a complete and total Karen who gives OP trouble at every possible opportunity. Mess with my job, Karen? It's go time! OP expertly out maneuvers the Karen and gets her fired with one simple conversation.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
